name: You agree to abide by all applicable laws regarding use of our websites and services,
and not to use our website to engage in antisocial, disruptive or destructive acts.
You may not post, link or upload any material that is harmful to our user's computers
or objectionable, in our sole discretion, including content that is obscene,
indecent, defamatory, hateful or intolerant in nature. You may not publish content that
constitutes 'junk mail', 'spam', or 'phishing'. You may not upload
commercial content on the Site or use Site to solicit others to join or become members of
any other online service or other organization. We may report any activity that may violate
the law to officials, regulators or other third parties,
and we may do so without prior notice to you. You agree to provide true, accurate, current, and
complete information about you as prompted during the registration process for any our Service,
and to maintain and update the information,
when necessary, to keep it accurate. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality
of any account numbers and passwords assigned to you or input by you, and you agree to be
fully responsible for all activities that occur
through anyone's use of your password or account numbers, whether or not authorized by you.
You agree to notify Origin immediately if you become aware of any unauthorized use of your
password or account or any other breach of security
related to our Service.
Copyright, Trademark and Disclaimer Notices Origin.com is the sole owner or
lawful licensee of all the rights and interests in the Sites and the Site Content
including, but not limited to, text, design, graphics, logos, files, images, photos,
video, software,code, and other proprietary content. The Sites and Site Content
embody trade secrets and other intellectual property rights protected under
worldwide copyright and other laws. All title, ownership and intellectual property
rights in the Sites and Site Content shall remain with Origin.com, our affiliates
or licensors of the Site Content, as the case may be. 'Origin', 'Origin.com' and
related icons and logos are registered trademarks or trademarks or service marks
of Origin and related icons and logos are registered trademarks or trademarks or
service marks of Origin.com, in various jurisdictions and are protected under
applicable copyright, trademark and other proprietary rights laws. The unauthorized
copying, modification, use or publication of these marks is strictly prohibited.
Origin may have independent third parties involved in the provision of the Services
(e.g., the authentication and verification service providers). You
may not use any trademark, service mark or logo of such independent third parties
without prior written approval from such parties. The 'Origin.Com' name and logo
are registered trademarks. Permission is granted to electronically copy
and print hard copy portions of this site for purchased products. While following
any expressly stated restrictions or limitations relating to specific material,
download or print portions of the material from the different areas of
the site solely for your own non-commercial use. Any other use, including but not
limited to the reproduction, distribution, display or transmission of the content
of this is strictly prohibited, unless authorized by Origin. You further
agree not to change or delete any proprietary notices from materials downloaded from
the site. By posting any products for sale on the Origin.com website, all third-party
vendors are warranting that they own any copyright associated
with such products or designs, have appropriate licenses to such products or designs,
and/ or are otherwise lawfully able to sell such products or designs. If Origin is
alerted to a potential copyright infringement claim regarding
any products or designs posted on the Origin.com website, Origin reserves the right
to remove such material from teh website, at its discretion. Third-party vendors who
are found to be repeat infringers of third-parties' copyright
rights are subject to having their rights to use the Origin.com terminated.
Origin provides a platform for the third-party vendors and you to negotiate
and complete transactions. All products descriptions are published by the third-party
vendor who lists the product on our platform. Origin does not warrant that product
descriptions or other content of any Origin Service is accurate, complete, reliable,
current, or error-free. If a product offered is not as described, you are to
address with the third-party vendor who listed the product.
Origin provides a platform for the third-party vendors and you to
negotiate and complete transactions. All products descriptions are published by
the third-party vendor who lists the product on our platform. Origin does not
warrant that product descriptions or other content of any Origin Service is
accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. If a product offered is not
as described, you are to address with the third-party vendor who listed the product.
Despite our best efforts, a small number of the items on our Site may
be mispriced. If the correct price of an item sold on Origin.com platform is
higher than other our stated price, we will, at our discretion, either contact you
for instructions before shipping or cancel your order whether or not your credit
card has been charged or other payment has been accepted.
All items purchased from Origin.com are made pursuant to a shipment contract.
This means that the risk of loss and title for such items pass to you upon our delivery to
the carrier.
Origin does not take title to returned items until the item arrives at
the designated Returns center. At our discretion, a refund may be issued without
requiring a return. In this situation, Origin does not take title to the refunded
item. For more information
about our returns and refunds, please see our Returns Policy.
In an attempt to provide increased value to our visitors, Origin.com
may link to sites operated by third parties. However, even if the third party is
affiliated with Origin, Origin has no control over these linked sites, all of
which have separate privacy
and data collection practices, independent of Origin. These linked sites are only
for your convenience and therefore you access them at your own risk. Nonetheless,
Origin seeks to protect the integrity of its web site and the links
placed upon it and therefore requests any feedback on not only its own site, but
for sites it links to as well (including if a specific link does not work). If
there are links to unaffiliated websites they are not covered in this agreement.
We do not endorse or make any representations about such unaffiliated websites, or
any information or other products or materials found there, or any results that
may be obtained from using them. If you decide to access any unaffiliated
websites linked to this website, you do so entirely at your own risk.
We are not responsible for the content of such other websites and shall not
be liable for any damages or injuries arising from your visits there.

items.name: Social Network: Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube

name: The Origin Facebook, Twitter and YouTube pages are run and maintained
by individuals from Origin. The views, opinions, depicted results and experiences
expressed in user-submitted comments are solely those of the author and do not
necessarily reflect
those of Origin.
Please understand that you assume total responsibility and risk when
you use our website. Our website and services are provided on an 'as is' and 'as
available' basis. You understand that Origin does not guarantee that anything on
our websites will be
free of infection or viruses that might damage or interfere with your computer,
data or personal information. Origin does not make any express or implied warranties,
representations or endorsements whatsoever (including but not limited
to, warranties of title or non-infringement, or the implied warranties of
merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose) with regard to our website,
its contents, or any services provided through our website.
We reserve the right to terminate our services to anyone at any time,
for any reason, and without notice. You also have the option of canceling your
account at any time. In the event of cancellation or termination, you will lose
all data related to your
account.
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY ORIGIN
ON OR THROUGH THE SITES ARE PROVIDED 'AS IS', 'AS AVAILABLE' AND “WITH ALL FAULTS”,

KIND CONCERNING ANY PRODUCT OR SERVICE OFFERED OR DISPLAYED ON THE SITES.
Each User hereby further agrees that Origin is not responsible and shall
have no liability to you, for any material posted by others, including defamatory,

each User. Origin reserves the right, at our own expense, to assume the exclusive

You agree that your use of this site shall be governed in all respects

sale of goods. You agree
that jurisdiction over and venue in any legal proceeding directly or indirectly

of Origin.com products) shall be in the state or federal courts located
in Los Angeles County, France. Any cause of action or claim you may have with
respect to the site
(including but not limited to the purchase of Origin.com products) must be
commenced within one (1) year after the claim or cause of
action arises. Origin's failure to insist upon or enforce strict performance of
any provision of these terms and conditions shall not be construed as a waiver
of any provision or right. Neither the course of conduct between the parties
nor trade practice shall act to modify any of these terms and conditions. Origin
